Detailed Description

Determines moisture content of live herbaceous and woody fuels from ambient air temperature, relative humidity, rainfall and time of year.

LiveFuelMoisture is an implementation of the GSI-based LFMC model

Member Function Documentation

double TminMax = 5.0,
double VPDMin = 900,
double VPDMax = 4100,
double DaylMin = 36000,
double DaylMax = 39600,
double PcpMin = 0.5,
double PcpMax = 1.5 )

Update function for GSI-based fuel moistures based on daily weather data. Note: Latitude is set during initialization.

Parameters
[in]RHRelative Humidity (1-100%).
[in]TempFAir temperature (F).
[in]MinTempF24-hour minimum temperature (F)
[in]JdayDay of Year (1-366)
[in]Precip2424 hour precipitation
Returns
NONE

Set the environmental limits for the GSI calculations This function defines the environmental limits for the minimum temperature, vapor pressure deficit and daylength indicator functions used to calculate GSI.

Parameters
[in]TminMinLower limit for minimum temperature (C).
[in]TminMaxUpper limit for minimum temperature (C).
[in]VPDMinLower limit for vapor pressure deficit (Pa).
[in]VPDMaxUpper limit for vapor pressure deficit (Pa).
[in]DaylMinLower limit for daylength (minutes)
[in]DaylMaxUpper limit for daylength (minutes)
Returns
NONE
